title: Charming Historic House with Modern Touches in Suwałki's Polnocne
description: Discover this delightful detached house blending historic character with contemporary living. Offering a comfortable 148 sqm layout, the home presents three spacious bedrooms and two updated bathrooms. Admire the original architectural details, complemented by a stylish open floor plan, a sun-filled modern kitchen, and a generous co-working space ideal for student life. The relaxing atmosphere is rounded out by a practical heated driveway and a dedicated laundry room.
neighborhood_description: Polnocne is an emerging neighborhood on Suwałki's northern edge, featuring new modern developments infused into a tranquil, semi-rural setting. Known for its scenic mountain views and abundant greenery, the area offers direct access to highways, making it easy to connect with nearby universities, shopping, and nature escapes while preserving a peaceful atmosphere ideal for study and reflection.
target_buyer: Ideal for students or young academics seeking an inspirational setting and high-speed access to nearby campuses or work centers without the bustle of the urban core.
market_positioning: Uniquely positioned for value-minded students and professionals, this historic-modern home offers generous living space, privacy, and features found more typically in premium contemporary accommodations.
